2) Since I am in need of money for my family expenses and other urgent works, I have sold the Scheduled Property to you today for the above mentioned amount of Rs. 1,47,000/- literally one lakh forty seven thousand rupees and have taken the entire purchase amount from you today in cash. I have taken possession of the Scheduled Property. Therefore, from today onwards, you, your descendants and your heirs shall have full rights to enjoy the Scheduled Property with full rights and to make donations and sales, but I, my descendants and my heirs shall not have any right-related obligations on the Scheduled Property. The said property shall not be alienated or alienated by anyone till today. I have not made any objection or doubt.
I have resolved the previous disputes regarding this sale property at my own expense and have confirmed the rights acquired by them. I hereby give my consent to the sale deed of sale of the immovable property.

sections.content: The property covered under Sale Deed No 534 of 2018 dated 23/Feb/2018, executed by in favour of Yeddula Mohan, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 66.66 Sq.Yds, located near by house number 7-2-195, Assessment No. 1006001221 comprised in survey number 230-B situated in Rayadurg Village and Gram Panchayat and Mandal , within the District of Anantapur registered at sub-registrar office Rayadurg is bounded as follows: North by: House of Ningamma South by: House of Petnikota Srinivasulu East by: Road West by: Khadi Store Wall

It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or
Lease Deed

Note : It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
